posts.post_content:
Would like to purchase the following 1909 Ramly catchers...VG condition or better.

Back damage OK.

Looking for:

Jimmy Archer, Jim Ball, Walter Blair, Roger Bresnahan, Peaches Graham, Mike Kahoe, Tubby Spencer, Jim Styephens, and Ira Thomas.

Also plenty of trade material available.

Thanks,

Patrick

Cards are packed for the National, not sure if I have any Catchers, but will have about 20 nice T204's in Cleveland. I am at booth 927 if you are coming.

Scott

Scott,

Have a great National! 

My National days are behind me!

Good luck!

Patrick
